name: GreenRevenge
description:
You play mother nature and your goal is to readicate  human cockroaches that swarm the planet, thanks to the three element you master: rain, wind. and fire. 

This game was conceived by Polytechnique students during a 60-hour course on video game making with the Unity engine.  

Authors :  Aude Bouillé ; Adrien Combelles ; Rim El Mallah
